Description: 2004 Gibson Les Paul Custom Shop Historic 1959 '59 Reissue EXC From the 2006 Gibson Custom Shop "ROADWORN" charity auction, 2004 Les Paul Historic 1959 R9 Custom Shop Faded Cherry Sunburst Reissue #9 47xx. A number of unique and one-off guitars were sold to employees and a handful of VIP clientele and all hot branded "ROADWORN" on the rear of the headstocks. Authentically figured Eastern Maple top with cherry sunburst finish and desirable Madagascar Rosewood fretboard. Madagascar Rosewood is now listed on both the CITES Appendix II and IUCN Red List. Finish is very thin and hard and not soft or sticky feeling, and has nicely shrunk and sunken into the pores of the wood like an old finish does. Weight is 9.0lbs. Near mint condition with only the slightest sign of handling. Essentially unplayed from a private collection. Fresh setup including intonation, medium action with 10-46 gauge nickel round wound strings. Nut slot is evenly spaced and probably not quite slotted deeply enough, but the new owner can have it final slotted to preference. Neck is straight. No fretwear or playability issues. The Lifton reissue case is also in like new condition inside and out and includes the lock key. This guitar has alot of sustain and note bloom. This one is a player's dream; it has "the" tone. It is simply an exceptional instrument that will please even the most discerning player or collector. Everything is included as shown and described including: 2004 Historic Les Paul 1959 #9 47xx Lifton reissue case with key Care pack as shown All photos were taken indoors in ambient light with an inexpensive digital camera with no additional light or fancy photo editing. What is shown and described above is exactly what you are bidding on. $69.99 FedEx insured shipping, CUSA only. Package tracking included. Will ship in a proper guitar shipping carton and have a U-Line "shockwatch" (rough transit/handling shock detector) attached. Sale is final to winning bidder. PayPal payment only. Will only ship to confirmed/verified address. This item cannot ship to PO boxes. Returns will no longer be granted unless item has been clearly misrepresented due to previous abuse of this privilege. Check my feedback and bid with confidence, I am an established eBay member since January 1999, ID Verified, and maintain Power-Seller status. Thank you.
Title: 2004 Gibson Les Paul Custom Shop Historic 1959 '59 Reissue Cherry Sunburst EXC
